channel.title: Our Work on All Phase Masonry
channel.description: Recent content in Our Work on All Phase Masonry

item.title: Makakilo Blue Rock Retaining Wall with Stairway
item.description: This project was completed on a beautiful Makakilo home. We constructed a terraced retaining wall using blue rock and installed a new stairway with a concrete patio. We excavated and constructed new wall to fit the slope the home was on. We built a new concrete landing perfect size for entertaining and stairway for ease of travel down each terrace. #slide-window { position: relative; width: 500px; height: 300px; overflow: hidden; top: 0px; left: 0px; } #slides-list { width: 500px; height: 300px; position: absolute; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transition: all 0.

item.title: Landscaping in Makaha Valley
item.description: This Project wanted a Exterior that match the beautiful Makaha Scenery. A Retaining Wall, Tropical Plants, & Sod Installation. See Landscaping in Makaha Valley portfolio on Yelp!

item.title: Pupukea - Moss Rock Wall
item.description: This Country Side Home in Pupukea wanted to replace there old chain link fence at the entrance with something that matched there lush landscape. Moss Rock Wall are a popular choice for Hawaii Homeowners, for durability and the tropical aesthetic itâ€™s known for.
